document.body:
Home About Hot-Screensaver
Hot-screensaver Lifestyle, Hotels, Travel, Interesting People, Celebrities, Places and Property The Chicken Rice Shop
Jul 4th, 2007 by Neo
Let me show you what I had for dinner today. Yes, nothing beats chicken rice from the famous The Chicken Rice Shop . I guess this is the only chicken rice operator with an online presence. Heard there is a very famous chicken rice stall in Kajang (behind the Kajang wet market), but I doubt they have a website, maybe they don’t even know how to surf the web.
The restaurant serves lots of differently prepared chickens. There are traditionally steamed, roast, honey, barbecued or braised chicken to choose from…too many until I don’t know which to choose for. In the menu, all of them look too good to be missed. But in the end I just simply pick two of them.
Authentic honey chicken from the best chicken rice restaurant in town! You look at it you will salivate already!
Another signature dish which is my favorite is the so called Pai Tee or fondly known as Top Hats among my friends. It is made of dainty pastry shells filled with shredded vegetables and chicken meat accompanied by a tangy sweet-sour sauce.
The Pai Tee is so crunchy and yummy. It’s a perfect“dessert”to go with the main course–the chicken rice.
According to Wikipedia , up to now there are a total of 24 outlets in the Peninsular Malaysia (excluded Sabah, Sarawak and Labuan). So, next time you know where to go for the best chicken rice already.

9 Responses to“The Chicken Rice Shop”
on 04 Jul 2007 at 6:01 pm 1 Che-Cheh Ohh I sooooo LOVE Chicken Rice Shop but then hor not all outlets’chicken rice are good. Some are really yucky.
So you know what to do…visit the sedap one only lo. on 04 Jul 2007 at 7:15 pm 2 wuching poor cocka doodle on 05 Jul 2007 at 9:58 pm 3 Rabbit Eh, besides this The Chicken Rice Shop, do you there’s one called The House of Chicken Rice? I think they serve the same kind food. Yeah, PaiTee rocks! But i’ve only tried the one from house of chicken rice. on 21 Mar 2008 at 4:00 pm 4 BS Lim Oh my god!!! I love“Chicken Rice Shop”so much. When we talk about its price, i think it is affordable to all students. When to talk about value, i think it is also included. I like to drop by to this shop when i go to shopping. For sure i like to order the curry chicken set. The satisfaction i really can’t tell. You need to try only can know its tastes. Yummy!!! on 19 May 2008 at 12:22 am 5 A&W fast food restaurant - Hot-screensaver [...] chicken rice and one Connie Dog. Oh yes, they serve chicken rice too, but you can be certain that The Chicken Rice Shop still serves the best chicken rice in [...] on 30 Jul 2008 at 12:30 pm 6 i love food Haha…i love chicken chicken rice esp from tesco puchong..house of chicken rice..nice and yummy on 30 Jul 2008 at 12:32 pm 7 chicken lover there is one stall at maju junction food court selling chicken rice. i think its called house of chicken rice. i tried the roast chicken rice..cheap and nice. esp the sauce. give it a try. hahah on 04 Aug 2008 at 1:39 pm 8 klhereicome hmmmmm chicken rice…the alamanda shopping center putrajaya food court got one stall selling super sedap chicken rice and pai tee too.. on 24 Feb 2009 at 3:23 pm 9 thaitourist sawadeekap,
hi all…heard so much about chicken rice…that day had chance to try chicken rice at maju junction…wow..bbq chicken rice was good and nice..its at 3d floor.give a try!!! yummy
